validationError.errorMessage: FROM email address is mandatory and it cannot be left blank.
TO email address is mandatory and it cannot be left blank.

SMTP host name is mandatory and can not be left blank. Please contact your IT manager for all SMTP detail, or if you are using Outlook then you can found this setting in File/Info/Account setting/email TAB and double click on account to view the detail

SMTP Port no is mandatory and can not be left blank.Please contact your IT manager for all SMTP detail, or if you are using Outlook then you can found this setting in File/Info/Account setting/email TAB and double click on account to view the detail

SMTP user name is mandatory and it cannot be left blank.Please contact your IT manager for all SMTP detail, or if you are using Outlook then you can found this setting in File/Info/Account setting/email TAB and double click on account to view the detail.

SMTP password is mandatory and it cannot be left blank.Please contact your IT manager for all SMTP detail, or if you are using Outlook then you can found this setting in File/Info/Account setting/email TAB and double click on account to view the detail.

EMAIL SENDER NAME must be only alpha numeric. you need to update your email address book or email address SENDER NAME, which is been used to send the email by removing all special characters except alpha numeric charactors.
